titleInfo.title: File F/6 'Papers Regarding the Supply of Ice by Municipality to the Agency Staff'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 42; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 4-14; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file contains an exchange of letters and documentation between the Manama Municipality and the Political Agency in Bahrain on a dispute arising from the supply of ice to the Municipality during 1935. Subsequent to letters with complaints by the Agency about the Municipality's staff appropriating of ice without permission, the file contains a number of papers and tables regarding the supply of ice and costs associated with it.
